name: Rusty Key
description: An old, rusty key. Wonder what it opens?

name: Ancient Scroll
description: A tattered scroll with faded, unreadable writing.

name: Glowing Gemstone
description: A rough gemstone that emits a faint, pulsating light.

name: Treasure Map Fragment
description: A torn piece of parchment, showing a crude drawing of islands and an 'X' that marks the spot.

name: Sextant
description: A nautical instrument used for navigating by the stars. Essential for any seasoned pirate captain.

name: Bottle of Grog
description: A dusty bottle filled with a potent, pirate brew. Smells like adventure (and bad decisions).

name: Pirate Flag
description: A tattered black flag with a skull and crossbones. The infamous Jolly Roger.

name: Gold Coins
description: A small pouch of glittering gold coins. Looks valuable.

name: Obsidian Shard
description: A sharp piece of volcanic glass.

name: Pearl Necklace
description: A beautiful necklace of lustrous pearls.

name: Captain's Logbook
description: A weathered logbook from an unknown captain.

name: Loyal Parrot
description: A talkative parrot that now follows you. Squawks occasionally about crackers.

name: Rum-Soaked Map
description: A tattered map, stained with rum and secrets. Parts of it are barely legible.

name: Cannonball
description: A heavy iron cannonball, standard make.

name: Empty Bottle
description: An empty glass bottle. Could be useful for messages, or storing... rum?

name: Rostova's Spyglass
description: A finely crafted brass spyglass, clearly well-used but also well-loved. It has the initials 'A.R.' engraved on it.

name: Medium Pouch of Gold Coins
description: A decently weighted pouch filled with gold coins. A good reward for a helpful pirate.

name: Shadow Gem
description: A dark, obsidian-like gemstone that seems to absorb light. It feels cold to the touch and emanates a faint, unsettling aura.

name: Pouch of Cursed Doubloons
description: A heavy pouch of ancient doubloons. They glitter enticingly, but carry an ominous feeling. Spending them might have unforeseen consequences.
